Héritier Bondongo Kabeya (amụrụ na 29 Ọgọstụ na afọ 1982), nke a maara site na aha egwu ya dị ka Héritier Watanabe bụ onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-ede egwu na Congo, onye na-agba egwu si Kinshasa Democratic Republic of the Congo
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri

Ọ bụ onye otu Wenge Musica Maison Mère site na afo 2001 ruo afọ 2015 ọ hapụrụ otu ahụ wee bịanye aka na Obouo Music Label nke David Monsoh ma wepụta aha mbụ ya "B.M" na Julai, na afọ 2016 na abọm mbụ ya "Carrière d'honneur - Retirada" na Nọvemba, na afọ 2016.
Heriter Watanabe Onye na-eme ihe nkiri Congo na-arụ ọrụ na otu Wenge Musica Maison Mere
